origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.get_info', 'description': 'This function provides information about various insurance types based on the insurance type and query type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'insuranceType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of insurance, e.g., enterprise_annuity, supplementary_medical.'}, {'name': 'queryType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of query, e.g., overview, policy, conditions.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'info', 'description': 'The information about the insurance type based on the query.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.get_info, 它的参数输入如下: 'insuranceType'是'enterprise_annuity', 'queryType'是'overview'.
